alert.note: Alert for Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 3:23AM EDT until July 01 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Perry County in south central Indiana... Hancock County in central Kentucky... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 223 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Santa Claus to near Eureka, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Tell City, Hawesville, Lewisport, Cannelton, Troy, Skillman, Goering, Pellville, Gerald and Dodd. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
